metadata.title: PasteVault - Secure Encrypted Paste Sharing
metadata.description: Share code, text, and markdown securely with end-to-end encryption. Zero-knowledge paste sharing with expiry and burn-after-read options.

draft.unsavedDraft: You have an unsaved draft from {draftAge}

shareSuccess.title: Paste Created Successfully!
shareSuccess.description: Your paste has been encrypted and is ready to share
shareSuccess.passwordProtectedWarning: This paste is password-protected. The recipient will need the password to decrypt it.
shareSuccess.urlWarning: The decryption key is in the URL fragment (#k=...). Anyone with this URL can read your paste.

viewPaste.passwordPrompt: This paste is password protected. Enter the password to decrypt and view the content.

errors.pasteNotFoundDesc: The paste you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.
errors.pasteBurnedDesc: This paste was set to burn after reading and has already been viewed.
errors.pasteExpiredDesc: This paste has expired and is no longer available.
errors.invalidFormat: Invalid paste format or missing decryption key
errors.decryptionError: Failed to decrypt paste. Invalid key or corrupted data.
